title: Logo for Video/Software Company --- Please Critique
author: D0ct0rteeth

comments.content:
So is the name V Social? GVL Social? Reverse check mark Social?

Why are you cutting a pie slice out of my TV?

I was attempting to play up on the television, technology and connectivity concepts.

Maybe a more literal TV image would help

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/Logos_v4_4074.gif)

What type of image is this company trying to create for itself? This logo is a lot more “fun” than your first one.

What words or ideas does the client want associated with their brand?

- Lex
Tell us more about the company and the project brief. It’s hard to critique a logo sans context.
You approach is like a shotgun, there is no focus
